boat.name: Arriana
boat.full_description: During the Netherlands Anniversary Tour, 2014, 'Arriana' was photographed by the local press in Hoorn. To find out more visit the news item with a translation of the Dutch article.
boat.construction_details: G R P hull,spars of Colombian pine with mahogany deck
boat.short_description: 'Arriana' is a Tamarisk 29 based on the Falmouth Quay Punt. 'She took part in the OGA Netherlands 10th Anniversary Tour, 2014.

for_sales.sales_text:
"Arriana" is a Tamarisk 29 based on the Falmouth Quay Punt. Three owners since she was built in 1981. Currently based at Swale Marina.

She has four berths plus a day berth for lounging. Engine Bukh 36 hp three cylinders.
New prop and shaft 2008. New mast 2014. Lifting bowsprit. New sails by Mark Butler 2009. Spare main, storm jib, storm main, genoa staysail. Headsails on Wykeham Martin gear. Hot water. Enclosed heads and shower just inside companionway. Gas two ring hob and grill. 240 volt cooker for alongside. 4 anchors. Dinghy. Auto pilot.
for_sales.summary: "Arriana" is a Tamarisk 29 based on the Falmouth Quay Punt. Three owners since she was built in 1981. Currently based at Swale Marina.
